product_name: Adventure Medical Kits Adventure Bath Wipes
long_description: Adventure Medical Kits Adventure Bath Wipes give you that clean-all-over feeling even when you're miles from the nearest shower. 8 x 10 in. wipes provide rinse-free bathing. Wipes are moistened with patented cleansing formula containing antibacterial agents, vitamins and moisturizers. PH-balanced, alcohol-free wipes are gentle on the skin and neutralize odors. Adventure Medical Kits Adventure Bath Wipes come in resealable packaging. Active ingredients: Benzalkonium chloride (0.1%).
short_description: Adventure Medical Kits Adventure Bath Wipes give you that clean-all-over feeling even when you're miles from the nearest shower.
